amendment.description: In the nature of a substitute.

action.text: Amendment SA 2875 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 2875 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 44. Record Vote Number: 204.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 2875 made in Senate.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 302(f) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2875.
Amendment SA 2875 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Tester. (consideration: CR S6727) In the nature of a substitute.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 2875 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 44. Record Vote Number: 204.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2875 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Tester.
